block.p: Nicole Felice Migdon, the daughter of Hermine and Sidney Migdon of Manhattan, was married yesterday evening to David Seth Finkel, the son of Lois and Frank Finkel of East Hills, N.Y. Rabbi Michael White officiated at the New York Botanical Gardens in the Bronx.

Mrs. Finkel, 26, is to become the director of communications later this fall for Origins, a skin care and cosmetics product line at Estee Lauder Companies in Manhattan. She graduated from the University of Michigan. Her father is a partner in Goldfarb & Fleece, a Manhattan law firm. Her mother is a social worker at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York.

Nicole Felice Migdon, the daughter of Hermine and Sidney Migdon of Manhattan, was married yesterday evening to David Seth Finkel, the son of Lois and Frank Finkel of East Hills, N.Y. Rabbi Michael White officiated at the New York Botanical Gardens in the Bronx.

Mrs. Finkel, 26, is to become the director of communications later this fall for Origins, a skin care and cosmetics product line at Estee Lauder Companies in Manhattan. She graduated from the University of Michigan. Her father is a partner in Goldfarb & Fleece, a Manhattan law firm. Her mother is a social worker at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York.

Mr. Finkel, 28, is the director of business development at Bigfoot.com, an e-mail directory, in Manhattan. He graduated from Tulane University. His father is the president of Davis & Warshaw, a plumbing and heating supplies distributor in Maspeth, Queens.
